trans-unit.source: Enables sending data to a Web service from within a workflow.
This class cannot be inherited.
A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity> activity can only be included in a workflow that has a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity> activity.

The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity> activity requires that the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity.InputActivityNameProperty> is set, and only <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity> activities located in the same workflow are valid values.
The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity> activity models the return value of a Web service method call.
It is intended to be paired with a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity> that represents the input parameters to a Web service method call.
<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity> activities are used only if the method on the Web service interface contract contains a return value.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
The user-defined name of the activity.
Gets or sets the name of the preceding <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity"></xref> class.
The name of the preceding <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity"></xref> class.
Defines the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity"></xref> that this <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity"></xref> is matched with.
Gets the collection of bindings associated with the out/ref and return value of the corresponding <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity"></xref> method.
This collection is used to bind the outbound parameters to locations in the workflow.
When the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity"></xref> executes, it extracts the values from the bound locations and delivers these back to the blocked Web service method.

Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity.ParameterBindings"></xref> property.
Occurs before the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity"></xref> sends output to the client.
Defines an event delegate that is executed before the activity sends the output of the Web service invocation.
Returns the access type for the specified property.
Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one another.
Without this interface, this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.
An object that implements <xref href="System.IServiceProvider"></xref> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
The name of the property.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes"></xref> enumeration value denoting the access level of the property.
Returns the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the specified property.
Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one another.
An object that implements <xref href="System.IServiceProvider"></xref> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
The name of the property.
The for the property whose name is passed as the propertyName parameter.
